name: Why Our Government and Agencies are So Bad at Security

content.html:
…er. Well not really. Did you expect an answer!

The fact is that I don’t know why so many individuals and groups of individuals are so inept and so incompetent, that it’s puts all our security into jeopardy.

http://willnorris.com/2008/08/delta-and-the-security-question-anti-pattern

This is a post from Will Norris, a computer programming guy, who points out in the above link, how a big airline Delta, naffs up basic privacy and security. [...]
